## Student Profile

# Alvin Chen

Alvin comes from Changsha, China. He went to 2 universities when he was an undergraduate, the mainland China one, Central South University, and the US one, Boston University. He studied Physics and got a bachelor of science degree in 2018. He then worked for a biotech company, Wondfo Biotech, for analysis of medicine testing data. Wondfo Biotech is a huge biotech company. Their headquarters is in Guangzhou, China, and they have many branches across the world, including a US office in Chicago. Alvin chose to go back to school for training in programming and computational science to make him a better analyst.
